title: [Temple, Hallway]
description: The remains of an oil lamp hang from the low, square rafters in the hall.  A dark spot beneath the dust on the floor proves to be a large oil stain, and shards of glass against the walls seem to be from the oil reservoir.  A small arch leads off to the east, lit by dim but harsh daylight.

The remains of an oil lamp hang from the low, square rafters in the hall.  A dark spot beneath the dust on the floor proves to be a large oil stain, and shards of glass against the walls seem to be from the oil reservoir.  A small arch leads off to the east, lit by cloud-dimmed moonlight.
